name: Saint Seiya RPG: Asgard Chapter
summary: This is a game developed on the RPG Maker 2000 platform based on the "Asgard" phase of the anime "Knights of the Zodiac" (Saint Seiya) between 2000 and 2003. It is completely freeware. Use different images and music, both from anime and other games (mainly from the “Phantasy Star” franchise, from the Master System and Mega Drive). Seven warriors wearing the legendary "Armors of the Gods" met with Hilda, who is on Earth the representative of Odin, lord of Asgard, in northern Europe. They swore to destroy the Sanctuary of Athena. When Shido de Mizar appears, he defeats Aldebaran de Touro in the Sanctuary and then goes to Japan to end the life of Saori Kido (Athena). However, Seiya and the other Bronze Saints emerge to discover them with their new bronze armor, restored by Mu de Aries. The Knights decide to go to Asgard to investigate what happened and discovered that someone placed the Nibelung Ring on Hilda. And to remove the Ring, they need the legendary Balmung Sword, which they will only be able to gather together as Odin's seven Sapphires, defeating the seven God Warriors. Meanwhile, Athena will be burning her Cosmos to prevent the ice at the poles from melting.
